- **Best_For**: Privacy-focused decentralized messaging
- **Key_Features**: End-to-end encryption, self-hosted option
- **User_Limit**: Unlimited users
- **Main_Limitations**: Requires technical setup for self-hosting
- **Cost**: Free

**Row 2:**
- **Platform**: Slack
- **Best_For**: Professional team messaging
- **Key_Features**: Channels, DMs, 90-day history, 5GB storage
- **User_Limit**: Unlimited users
- **Main_Limitations**: 90-day message history, 10 app integrations
- **Cost**: Free

**Row 3:**
- **Platform**: WhatsApp Business
- **Best_For**: Customer communication & business messaging
- **Key_Features**: Business profile, automated messages, broadcast
- **User_Limit**: Unlimited contacts
- **Main_Limitations**: Limited to business messaging features
- **Cost**: Free

**Row 4:**
- **Platform**: RingCentral Video Pro
- **Best_For**: Complete free messaging solution
- **Key_Features**: Unlimited users, 100-participant meetings, file sharing
- **User_Limit**: Unlimited users
- **Main_Limitations**: No advanced enterprise features
- **Cost**: Free

**Row 5:**
- **Platform**: Flock
- **Best_For**: Team messaging with productivity tools
- **Key_Features**: Team chat, video calls, productivity integrations
- **User_Limit**: Unlimited users
- **Main_Limitations**: No advanced reporting in free version
- **Cost**: Free

**Row 6:**
- **Platform**: Zoho Cliq
- **Best_For**: Business messaging with Zoho ecosystem
- **Key_Features**: Team chat, 100-person video calls, 100GB storage
- **User_Limit**: Unlimited users
- **Main_Limitations**: 10,000 message search limit
- **Cost**: Free

**Row 7:**
- **Platform**: Chanty
- **Best_For**: Simple team chat and task management
- **Key_Features**: Team chat, task management, unlimited history
- **User_Limit**: Unlimited users
- **Main_Limitations**: 10,000 message history
- **Cost**: Free

**Row 8:**
- **Platform**: Microsoft Teams
- **Best_For**: Enterprise collaboration with Office integration
- **Key_Features**: Unlimited chat, 60-min meetings, 5GB storage
- **User_Limit**: Unlimited users
- **Main_Limitations**: 60-minute meeting limit, 5GB storage per user
- **Cost**: Free

**Row 9:**
- **Platform**: Google Chat
- **Best_For**: Google Workspace integration
- **Key_Features**: Real-time messaging, Google Workspace integration
- **User_Limit**: Unlimited users
- **Main_Limitations**: Requires Google account
- **Cost**: Free

**Row 10:**
- **Platform**: Zoom (Free)
- **Best_For**: Video conferencing with team chat
- **Key_Features**: Video meetings (40-min limit), team chat, whiteboard
- **User_Limit**: 100 participants in meetings
- **Main_Limitations**: 40-minute meeting time limit
- **Cost**: Free

**Row 11:**
- **Platform**: Pebb
- **Best_For**: Comprehensive team communication hub
- **Key_Features**: Live news feed, employee engagement tools
- **User_Limit**: Unlimited users
- **Main_Limitations**: Newer platform, limited track record
- **Cost**: Free

**Row 12:**
- **Platform**: Twist
- **Best_For**: Async communication and threading
- **Key_Features**: Threaded conversations, calm messaging
- **User_Limit**: Unlimited users
- **Main_Limitations**: No built-in voice/video calling
- **Cost**: Free

**Row 13:**
- **Platform**: Bitrix24
- **Best_For**: CRM-integrated team communication
- **Key_Features**: Team chat, CRM, project management
- **User_Limit**: 12 users (free plan)
- **Main_Limitations**: 5GB storage limit
- **Cost**: Free
